sentence.Network_en: I am His sword, His weapon and His Vicegerent.
sentence.Network_cn: 我是他的剑, 他的武器,他的副手.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 考研词根4(7) -非常英语学习网 ... viatic a. 道路的, 旅行的 vicegerent n. 代理人 victory n. 战胜, 胜利, 成功.
以v开头的英语英文单词 ... vicarious 间接的，代理的 vicegerent 代理的 viceroy 副王,总督,太守.

list.abs: vice-principal 副校长vicegerency 代理人的地位-
vicegerency英['vais'd ir nsi]美['vais'd ir nsi] 添加到我的生词本复制词条  n. 代理人之地位复数:vicegerencies 参考例句.
A district under a vicegerent ' s jurisdiction ., 代理执政者辖区下的地区.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from medieval Latin vicegerent- ('person) holding office', from Latin vic- 'office, place, turn' + gerere 'carry on, hold'

means.word_mean: 1. someone appointed by a ruler as an administrative deputy

auth_sentence.content: Behold, thy Lord said to the angels: I will create a vicegerent on earth.
auth_sentence.res_content: Behold, thy Lord said to the angels: I will create a vicegerent on earth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Behold, thy Lord said to the angels: I will create a vicegerent on earth.
